publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2000.1 Stewart Stevenson: Local Authority Investments in Tobacco Companies—As an amendment to motion (S2M-2000) in the name of Mr Stewart Maxwell, insert at end "noting that, in light of ethical investment funds having out-performed stock market indices in recent years, any failure to do so may disadvantage future local authority pensioners."
S2M-2000.1 Local Authority Investments in Tobacco Companies (lodged on 15 November 2004) Donald Gorrie*

S2M-2000.1 Stewart Stevenson: Local Authority Investments in Tobacco Companies—As an amendment to motion (S2M-2000) in the name of Mr Stewart Maxwell, insert at end "noting that, in light of ethical investment funds having out-performed stock market indices in recent years, any failure to do so may disadvantage future local authority pensioners." Supported by: Donald Gorrie
